mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TICKETING (userID, movieName, movieTime, movieSeat, movieDay) VALUES (#{userID}, #{movieName}, #{movieTime}, #{movieSeat}, #{movieDay})
mapper.update: UPDATE TICKETING SET userID = #{userID}, movieName = #{movieName}, movieTime = #{movieTime}, movieSeat = #{movieSeat}, movieDay = #{movieDay} WHERE ticketingSn = #{ticketingSn};
